source: TEXT_HEAVNZ527_01862_SEQ_00<tab>This moogle has lost something precious to him.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ527_01862_SEQ_00<tab>手紙の家のぐすぐすモーグリは、落ち込んでいるようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ527_01862_SEQ_01<tab>This poor moogle's ring was picked up by a syricta after the moogle dropped it during a leisurely stroll through the House of Letters. Get the precious ring back from one of the vicious syrictae in the area.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ527_01862_SEQ_01<tab>ぐすぐすモーグリから、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AF501 /var>を取り戻すよう頼まれた。手紙の家にいる「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20E2A01 /var>」を討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ527_01862_SEQ_02<tab>You have slain four elder syrictae, but none of them were the one that stole the poor moogle's ring. Slay more syrictae until you find the brazen beast that stole the ring.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ527_01862_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AF501 /var>は見つからなかった。さらに「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20E2A01 /var>」を討伐して、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AF501 /var>」を取り返そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ527_01862_SEQ_03<tab>The syricta gives up the lost ring after a fierce battle. Return it to the downcast moogle.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ527_01862_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AF501 /var>を取り返した。手紙の家の「ぐすぐすモーグリ」に渡そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ527_01862_SEQ_04<tab>The moogle lights up when you present the ring to him─apparently it cost him every kupo nut he had.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ527_01862_SEQ_04<tab>ぐすぐすモーグリに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AF501 /var>を渡した。ぐすぐすモーグリは<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AF501 /var>が戻ってきたことをとても喜んでいた。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ527_01862_TODO_00<tab>Retrieve the ring from an elder syricta.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ527_01862_TODO_00<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20E2A01 /var>からまれに得られる<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AF501 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ527_01862_TODO_01<tab>Retrieve the ring from an elder syricta.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ527_01862_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20E2A01 /var>からまれに得られる<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AF501 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ527_01862_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the ring to the moogle.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ527_01862_TODO_02<tab>ぐすぐすモーグリに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AF501 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ527_01862_REMAINSMOG01862_000_000<tab>Oh no... I was just enjoying a leisurely stroll and I dropped my favorite ring. I saw one of those brutish-looking syrictae pick it up. Pretty please, could you get it back for me, kupo?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ527_01862_REMAINSMOG01862_000_000<tab>ぐすっ……お散歩してたら指輪を落としてしまったくぽ……。
「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20E2A01 /var>」が拾ったのを見たけど……。
……取り返してくれないくぽ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ527_01862_REMAINSMOG01862_000_010<tab>I can't possibly hope to wrestle my ring from one of those syrictae by myself. You look like you can, though!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ527_01862_REMAINSMOG01862_000_010<tab>ぐすっ……お散歩してたら指輪を落としてしまったくぽ……。
「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20E2A01 /var>」が拾ったのを見たけど……。
……取り返してくれないくぽ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ527_01862_REMAINSMOG01862_000_020<tab>I can't believe those syrictae have the nerve to just take whatever they find off the ground. Were you able to recover my ring, kupo?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ527_01862_REMAINSMOG01862_000_020<tab>ぐすっ……お散歩してたら指輪を落としてしまったくぽ……。
「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20E2A01 /var>」が拾ったのを見たけど……。
……取り返してくれないくぽ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ527_01862_REMAINSMOG01862_000_021<tab>It's my ring! I knew you'd be able to get it back from those mean old syrictae. I'd never be able to forgive myself if I had lost this ring─it cost me my life savings of forty-two kupo nuts!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ527_01862_REMAINSMOG01862_000_021<tab>……ととと、取り返してくれたくぽ！？
これは「クポの実」42個と交換した、モグの全財産くぽ！
あぁ～、本当によかったくぽ！　ありがとうくぽ～！！
